entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of light snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
